title: UX Website Designer
job_overview:
WEBBLDR is a website development company that builds clean, strategic websites for construction and blue-collar companies across the U.S. We’re currently hiring a UX Website Designer who can turn creative ideas into clean, functional website designs using Figma.

This role is part-time and perfect for someone looking to build real-world experience while contributing to high-quality websites.

Your Responsibilities Will Include:
 • Designing desktop and mobile-friendly websites using Figma
 • Creating clean, responsive UX layouts (usually 5–7 pages per project)
 • Collaborating with our creative director and web developer
 • Organizing and preparing final Figma files for handoff to development
 • Thinking creatively—avoiding template designs and bringing fresh ideas
 • Occasionally assisting with wireframes, style guides, or UI kits

Required:
 • Strong Figma experience (you’ll be tested on this)
 • A good eye for layout, spacing, and hierarchy
 • Understanding of UX principles and responsive design
 • Able to work with developers and communicate design decisions
 • Portfolio showcasing web design and UX/UI layout experience
 • Detail-oriented and comfortable working remotely with deadlines
 • Excellent English and communication skills
 • Bonus: Familiarity with WordPress or Webflow is a plus

Application Instructions:
 • You must include your resume, a cover letter explaining your relevant experience, and portfolio links
 • Use the subject line: “UX Application – [Your Name]”
 • The word “UX” is your secret keyword. If you don’t include that in the subject line, your application will be rejected without review.
